title: Define Tasks Response
description: Response with a number of assigned `taskId`s and PUT URLs to which the definition can be uploaded, without the tasks becoming _pending_ immediately.

expires.description: Expiration datetime for PUT URLs in `tasks`

taskId.description: Unique task identifier, used when the defined task is to be scheduled.

taskUrl.description: URL for the task, when uploaded using `taskPutUrl` below.

taskPutUrl.description: Signed PUT URL to which the task definition can be uploaded. **Note**, `Content-Length` must be given and `Content-Type` must be set to `application/json`.
